page.title: 18TRAFFIC PROBLEMS
page.content: When the A5 from Shrewsbury to Telford was being repaired in the Spring of 1985,there was a noticeable increase in the volume of traffic using the B5062 road.This increase in traffic made crossing the road by the children of the school more difficult and dangerous. At the same time it was anounced by the County Council that they may dispose of the school crossing patrol. This understandably caused great concern amoung the parents and after representations and protests were made the County relented and are to keep the crossing patrol for the time being. High Ercall roads are also used by M.O.T.E.C. who train bus and lorry drivers from their local base just outside our area. During the Autumn months the road is also used by heavy sugar beet
